description:
Unofficial Peertube client P2Play is an unofficial Android client for Peertube. P2play is Material3 (and Material You coming soon), is being migrated to Jetpack compose and is made in Kotlin. Features:

  • ğŸ”‘ Login with your account (2FA support!)
  • ğŸ’¡ Play videos, comment and reply
  • ğŸ“ Rate, share and download videos
  • ğŸ”Š Follow and keep updated of your subscriptions
  • ğŸ”” See your notifications!
  • ğŸ” Search and find videos
P2play is in continuous development. Keep updated in our blog: P2play blog Or follow our blog in the fediverse (@p2play@personaljournal.ca)
